name: SociaPol
summary: Dive into Sociapol, a free VR-based social gaming platform where fun, friends, and parties collide! Customize your unique character with NFT accessories, earn SPOL tokens through gaming and socializing, and unlock exclusive lootboxes. Compete in immersive VR games and trade with a vibrant community. Join us for endless fun and unforgettable adventures in the virtual realm!
